name: Buddy MacMaster
description: '''Hugh Alan''' "'''Buddy'''" '''MacMaster''' {{Post-nominals|country=CAN|CM|ONS}} (October 18, 1924 â€“ August 20, 2014) was a Canadian fiddler. He performed and recorded both locally and internationally, and was regarded as an expert on the tradition and lore of [[Cape Breton fiddle music]].
